1.「また 会いましたね <cs_pchero>さん。| バトリンピック・予選のチェ: We meet again <cs_pchero>. Here are the|checkpoints for the Batlympics and Qualifiers.

2.「お忘れですか？| 前に 月光の花を集めていただいた者ですよ。| その節は お世: Did you forget? I am the one who collected the|moonlight flowers before. Thank you for your|help on that occasion.

3.「今は こちらで 予選の係員を務めていますよ。| <cs_pchero>さんとは: I'm a qualifying attendant here now. I was|wondering if <cs_pchero> and I could meet up|again here.

4.「あなたなら きっと 決勝バトルを勝ち抜き| 優勝することも 夢ではないんでしょ: I bet you wouldn't dream of winning the final|battle and becoming the winner.

5.「まあ それも 予選を突破すればの話……: Well, that is if you make it through the|qualifying rounds.

6.「残念ながら あなたが 闘士の割符を手に| 戻ることはないでしょう。: Unfortunately, you will never get your|Fighters' Tally back.

7.「……あなたは 余計なことを知ってしまった。| そんな あなたに 生きていてもら: You have learned unnecessary things. There are|people who don't want you to live.

8.「先ほどは まんまと 逃げられましたが| やはり ここで待っていれば 現れました: He got away with it earlier, but he would have|shown up if I had waited for him here. You are|very disciplined, aren't you?

9.「今度こそ 逃がしませんよ。| 我が主のために 死んでもらいます！: You won't get away this time. You will die for|my Lord!

10.「どうやら 手助けの必要は なかったようだな。: Apparently, they didn't need any help.

11.「ああ。こいつ 逃げようとしてたんで| ちょいとばかし なでといたぜ。: Ah. He was trying to escape, so I gave him a|little nudge.

12.「しかし アンタが 参加してるのを狙って| こいつが 係員をやってたんなら| こ: But if this guy was working as a valet to get|you in, this tournament doesn't look too|legit...

13.「さて それじゃ オレは失礼する！| ……この男のことは まかせてもらうぜ。|: Now then, if you'll excuse me. I'll take care|of this guy. I'll take care of this guy. I'm|the one who caught him.

14.「アンタも 聞きたいこととかあるだろうが| オレのほうの用件を 優先させてもらお: I'm sure you have questions you want to ask|me, but my business takes precedence over|yours. And don't forget this one!

16.クラークに|闘士の割符を 渡した！: I gave Clark the Fighters' Tally!

17.「……確かに これは 闘士の割符。| これで <pc>選手の予選は| 終了となり: ...Indeed, this is Fighters' Tally. This|concludes the qualifying round for|<pc> players.

18.「そして 同時に 第１回バトリンピックの| 予選全体も 終了とさせていただきます:
And at the same time, the entire preliminary|round of the first Batolympics is also coming|to an end. As a matter of fact, you were the|
|last one.

20.「おめでとうございます！！| あなたは バトリンピック決勝バトル| ４人目の参加: Congratulations! You are the fourth|participant in the Batolympics Final Battle to|win!

21.「ほう。<pc>は 残ったのか。| まずは おめでとうと言わせてもらおう。: Hou. So <pc> stayed. First, let me|congratulate you.

22.「これは セインズ選手。| もしかして 予選結果を聞きにこられたので？: This is Sainz. Perhaps he came to ask about|the qualifying results?

23.「どうしても 落ち着かなくってな……。| そろそろ 全参加者の予選が終わって|:
I just couldn't help but feel a little|restless... I thought that by now all the|participants would have qualified and the|
|results would be in, right?

24.「ンフフフ……。| 何を 心配することが ありましょう？| セインズ選手は ダン: What is there to worry about? Sainz is the|clear winner.

25.「わずか ４名だけの 決勝進出者の中に| 同じ ジェイコフ氏の弟子が ふたりもい:
I was surprised to see two of Mr. Jakov's|students among the only four finalists. I was|surprised to see two of Mr. Jaykoff's|
|disciples among only four finalists.

26.「オレは 元弟子だけどな。| ……っと ウワサをすれば なんとやらだ。: I'm a former apprentice. I'm a former|apprentice.

27.「チッ……。| まーた 余計なヤツがいるぜ。: Elaina, there's someone who doesn't need to be|here.

28.「……んで どうだった <pc>？| 予選は 無事 突破できたのか？: So...how did it go? Did you make it through|the qualifying rounds?

29.「ンフフフ……。| <pc>選手も セインズ選手も| 見事 予選を突破なさいまし: Well done to both <pc> and Sainz for|making it through the qualifying rounds.

30.「セインズも 参加してんのかよ……。| まあ とにかく 修行は達成できたわけだな: Sainz is in on it too... well, at least you've|accomplished your training. Then take this|with you.

31.「ところで 予選の順位は どうだったんだ？| セインズと <pc>の| どっちが: By the way, how did you finish in the|qualifying rounds? Who won, Sainz or|<pc>?

32.「ンフフフ……。| セインズ選手が 予選１位通過。| <pc>選手が 予選４位通: Sainz qualified in 1st place. <pc>|qualified in 4th place.

34.「クッ…… いい気になるなよ セインズ！| 決勝では 必ず <pc>が テメーに: Don't get cocky, Sainz! In the finals, I'm|gonna make sure that <pc> is gonna|make you smile!

35.「まあ 予選なんて しょせん お遊び。| バトルマスターの実力とは 関係ないから:
Well, qualifying is just for fun. It has|nothing to do with the battle master's|ability. After all, battle masters have to|
|fight, right?

36.「もちろん 決勝バトルで 当たっても| 後輩相手に 負けるつもりなんて| これっ: Of course, I have no intention of losing to a|junior opponent in the finals!

37.「……そういうワケだ <pc>。| 決勝で戦えるのを 楽しみにしてるぜ。| せい: ...That's why <pc>. I look forward to|seeing you in the finals. Don't let me down!

38.「ンフフフ……。じつに すばらしいっ！| 同じ師を持つ ふたりのバトルマスターの: Very wonderful! Sparks flying between two|battle masters who share the same master! It's|on fire!

39.「バトリンピック・決勝バトル……| これは がぜん 盛り上がってまいりましたよ！: The final battle of the Batolympics...it's|getting more and more exciting! Oh, no...
